title: Bug 14113: Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
description: Bug 14113: Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
OB: Build 20020416: Currently, when the attached source of a jar is changed, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired instead of an FSOURCEATTACHED or FSOURCEDETACHED delta. As a result, the UI closes the class file editors opened on this jar, which is the expected behavior for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta. However, when attempting to fix the delta to be an (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, the UI does not react.
EB: In this case, I expect the UI to refresh the class file editor to display the new source. As a temporary solution, I will fire a (FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH | FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta and remove the FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH when this bug is fixed.
